name: Joel Voldman
content: RLE :: Professor Joel Voldman The RLE Biological Microtechnology and BioMEMS Group performs research on microfluidics applied to cell biology, neuroscience, and medicine. We take a quantitative approach to technology design, and take projects all the way from engineering design to fabrication to biological and clinical validation.
